title: 2nd Half Sleepers + TNF Preview, Doubling Down - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/27
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode as we enter Week 8! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason each pick two “second half sleepers!” Which players make for great trade targets (or waiver wire pickups)? Plus, the Week 8 edition of Buy or Sell, and a preview of the exciting Thursday Night Football matchup between the Packers and Cardinals. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 27th, 2021.
  
 (04:30) - Buy or Sell
 (10:55) - NFL News
 (23:55) - Second Half Sleepers
 (24:35) - Keenan Allen
 (27:10) - Javonte Williams
 (32:25) - Trey Lance
 (38:05) - Julio Jones
 (41:15) - Henry Ruggs
 (43:45) - Logan Thomas
 (46:45) - Thursday Night Preview - Packers at Cardinals
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
